title: Savory
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Pizza, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery
description: Industrial style inspired vegan bistro. Offers an extensive breakfast from a British with baked beans or continental including cereal, fruit salad, bread, vegan cheese and sausage, jams, spreads, vegetables. Daily specials such as pizza, chili, soups, waffles. Regular menu items include a variety of sandwiches, burgers, hot dogs, and salads. Also you will find cupcakes and cakes in addition to smoothies, shakes, soft drinks, coffee and tea.
